channel.title: put on Güngör Budak
channel.description: Recent content in put on Güngör Budak

item.title: Running Script on Cluster (StarCluster)
item.description: Start a new cluster with the configuration file you modified: starcluster start cluster_name Send the script to the running cluster: starcluster put cluster_name myscr.csh /home/myscr.csh Run it using source: starcluster sshmaster cluster_name "source /home/myscr.csh >& /home/myscr.log"
